Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a plant that has enough water, showing it as healthy and growing.
The student can illustrate a plant that does not have water, showing it as wilted or not growing.
The student can illustrate a plant in a sunny environment, showing it as healthy and thriving.
The student can illustrate a plant in a dark environment, showing it as not growing well.
The student can use drawings to show that plants need both water and light to live and grow.
